entry.title: Headers Should Not Include using Declarations
entry.content:
Headers Should Not Include using Declarations

To use namespace members easily,language inducts the using declaration.A using declaration has the form: using namespace:: name; But about headers,if one header includes the using declaration,then every program which include the header all will get the same using declaration,which would make the program that didnâ€™t intend to use the specified library name encounter unexpected name conflicts.
